table.emptyRow: There are no messages stored in the selected Voicemail Box

empty.headline: In order to view and manage voicemails, first select a voicemail box in the table below.
empty.subtitle: Use the 'Select a Voicemail Box' above and to the left.

tooltips.delete: This will remove the selected voicemails from the database and they won't be retrievable afterwards.

receivedVMs.noCDR: We didn't find any corresponding CDR to this message. It is possible that the logs have been deleted from the system if this is an old message.
